pullRequest.title: Created a Word / String Count Service for German/English
pullRequest.bodyText:
Checklist

 I tested all changes and all related features with different users (student, tutor, instructor, admin) on the test server https://artemistest.ase.in.tum.de.
 Client: I added multiple integration tests (Jest) related to the features
 Client: I documented the TypeScript code using JSDoc style.
 Client: I added multiple screenshots/screencasts of my UI changes
 Client: I translated all the newly inserted strings into German and English

Motivation and Context


Closes #1528
Description

The goal of this pull request is to implement a word count / character count functionality for text exercises. Both the user when entering an answer and the tutor when correcting an answer should be displayed the word count and character count.
Steps for Testing


Log in to Artemis
Navigate to a text exercise as a student and enter some text, the word and character count should change
View the submission as a tutor, the word and character count should be displayed!

Screenshots

commit.message: Created a Word Count Service for German/English
Created Unit Test for Word Count Service
Improved type safety of word count service
Added word count badge to text-assesment-area-component
Also included character counting into service and renamed service
Added new translation strings for character cound

nodes.bodyText: Instead of looping over the changes, you can do if (changes.submission) and then access the current value via changes.submission.currentValue.

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                        "wordCount": "Anzahl der Wörter: {{count}}",
          
          
            
                        "wordCount": "Anzahl der Wörter: {{ count }}",

                        "characterCount": "Anzahl der Zeichen: {{ count }}",
